cards.targetAudience: Ultra High Net-worth Individuals (HNIs), by invitation only. For those with very high spends and a focus on luxury travel.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5 Reward Points per ₹150 spent.
cards.pointValueApprox: Up to ₹1 per point on SmartBuy for flights/hotels. ₹0.30 for cashback.
cards.rewardTransfer: Excellent 1:1 transfer ratio to top airlines (Vistara, KrisFlyer) and hotels (Marriott).
cards.milestoneBenefits: Complimentary nights at participating ITC hotels.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: Unlimited for Primary and Add-on cardholders.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: Unlimited via Priority Pass for Primary and Add-on cardholders.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Unlimited complimentary golf games. 1-night complimentary stay at participating ITC hotels. Club Marriott membership. Low forex markup.

cards.cardName: HDFC Diners Club Black Metal Edition
cards.targetAudience: High-income professionals and frequent travelers who value premium lifestyle and travel perks.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: Complimentary annual memberships of Club Marriott, Forbes, Amazon Prime, Swiggy One, and MMT BLACK.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5 Reward Points per ₹150 spent. 10X points on SmartBuy portal.
cards.pointValueApprox: Up to ₹1 per point on SmartBuy for flights/hotels. ₹0.30 for cashback.
cards.rewardTransfer: Excellent 1:1 transfer ratio to partners like Vistara, KrisFlyer, InterMiles.
cards.milestoneBenefits: Choice of 2 monthly vouchers (TataCLiQ, Ola Cabs, cult.fit Live, BookMyShow) on spending ₹80,000 in a calendar month.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: Unlimited for Primary and Add-on cardholders.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: Unlimited for Primary and Add-on cardholders.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: 6 complimentary golf games per quarter. 24/7 Concierge Service. Low forex markup.

cards.targetAudience: Mid-level professionals and frequent travelers seeking premium benefits without a very high fee.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: Complimentary Club Vistara Silver Tier and MMT Black Elite membership.
cards.rewardRateBase: 4 Reward Points per ₹150 on retail spends. 20 Reward Points per ₹150 on select merchants like Marks & Spencer, Myntra, Nykaa, Reliance Digital.
cards.pointValueApprox: ₹0.50 for flights/hotels via SmartBuy. ₹0.20 for cashback.
cards.rewardTransfer: Average 1:0.5 ratio to partners like Vistara, KrisFlyer.
cards.milestoneBenefits: ₹1,500 flight voucher on spending ₹1.5 Lakhs in a quarter. Additional ₹5,000 flight voucher on spending ₹7.5 Lakhs in an anniversary year.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 12 complimentary visits per year for the primary cardholder.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 6 complimentary visits per year via Priority Pass for the primary cardholder.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Good insurance cover, concierge services.

cards.targetAudience: Young professionals and online shoppers looking for high cashback on popular platforms.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5% Cashback on Amazon, BookMyShow, Cult.fit, Flipkart, Myntra, Sony LIV, Swiggy, Tata CLiQ, Uber and Zomato. 1% on all other spends (including wallet loads and EMI).
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 CashPoint = ₹1 for statement credit (min. 500 points).
cards.milestoneBenefits: ₹1,000 gift voucher on spending ₹1 Lakh in a calendar quarter.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Focused on cashback; minimal lifestyle perks.

cards.cardName: Tata Neu Infinity HDFC Bank Credit Card
cards.targetAudience: Users who frequently shop on the Tata Neu app and its partner brands (BigBasket, Croma, Tata CLiQ, etc.).
cards.rewardRateBase: 10% back as NeuCoins on Tata Neu app (5% base + 5% for NeuPass members). 5% on partner Tata brands. 1.5% on other spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 NeuCoin = ₹1. Redeemable on Tata Neu app.
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 4 complimentary visits per year via Priority Pass (1 per quarter).
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Revolving credit, fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.targetAudience: Regular commuters who spend significantly on fuel at IndianOil outlets.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5% of spends as 'Fuel Points' at IndianOil outlets (up to 250 points/month). 1 Fuel Point per ₹150 on other spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 Fuel Point = ₹0.96 when redeemed for free fuel via XTRAREWARDS program.
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: None.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Mainly focused on fuel savings. 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.targetAudience: Top-tier HNIs, by invitation only. A super-premium card focused on luxury lifestyle and travel.
cards.rewardRateBase: 4 Reward Points per ₹100 spent.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25 for statement credit.
cards.milestoneBenefits: Monthly milestone: Tata CLiQ Luxury voucher worth ₹1,500 on spending ₹1 Lakh. Annual milestone: Vouchers from Taj, LUXE, etc., on spending ₹5 Lakhs, ₹10 Lakhs.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: Unlimited for cardholder + 1 guest.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: Unlimited Priority Pass access for cardholder + 4 complimentary guest visits per year.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Unlimited movie tickets worth ₹1,000/month. Memberships to Amazon Prime, Lenskart Gold, Discovery Plus, EazyDiner Prime, BB Star.

cards.targetAudience: Affluent individuals seeking premium lifestyle, travel, and entertainment benefits.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: e-Gift Voucher worth ₹5,000 from brands like Yatra, Hush Puppies/Bata, Pantaloons.
cards.rewardRateBase: 2 Reward Points per ₹100. 10 Reward Points per ₹100 on Dining, Departmental Stores, and Grocery.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25 for statement credit.
cards.milestoneBenefits: Up to 50,000 bonus points (worth ₹12,500) annually. Bonus points at 3, 4, 5, and 8 Lakhs spend milestones.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 6 complimentary visits per year via Priority Pass (max 2 per quarter).
cards.lifestyleBenefits: 2 free movie tickets (worth ₹500) every month from BookMyShow. Club Vistara Silver membership.

cards.targetAudience: Everyone, especially online shoppers. The best straight-cashback card in India.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5% cashback on all online spends (up to ₹5,000/month). 1% cashback on all offline spends and utility bills.
cards.pointValueApprox: Not applicable (direct statement credit).
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 4 complimentary visits per year (1 per quarter).
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Purely cashback-focused.

cards.targetAudience: Lifestyle-oriented users who frequently spend on dining, movies, and groceries.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: e-Gift Voucher worth ₹3,000 from brands like Yatra, Bata/Hush Puppies, Pantaloons.
cards.rewardRateBase: 10 Reward Points per ₹100 on Dining, Groceries, Departmental stores & Movies. 2 points on other spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25 for statement credit.
cards.milestoneBenefits: Pizza Hut e-voucher worth ₹1,000 on spending ₹50,000 in a quarter. Yatra/Pantaloons voucher worth ₹7,000 on spending ₹5 Lakhs in a year.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 8 complimentary visits per year (2 per quarter).
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 4 complimentary visits per year via Priority Pass (max 2 per quarter).
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Club Vistara Silver membership. Trident Privilege Red Tier membership.

cards.targetAudience: Entry-level users and avid online shoppers on platforms like Amazon, BookMyShow, and Cleartrip.
cards.rewardRateBase: 10X Reward Points on online spends with partners - Amazon, BookMyShow, Cleartrip, Lenskart. 5X on all other online spends. 1 point per ₹100 on offline.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 Reward Point = ₹0.25 for statement credit.
cards.milestoneBenefits: Cleartrip e-voucher worth ₹2,000 on annual online spends of ₹1 Lakh and ₹2 Lakhs.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: None.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: 1% fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.cardName: ICICI Emeralde Private Metal Credit Card
cards.targetAudience: ICICI Private Banking clients. A top-tier card for the wealthiest customers.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: Complimentary night at select Oberoi Hotels and a Da Milano gift voucher.
cards.rewardRateBase: 6 Reward Points per ₹200 on retail (excluding fuel). 1 point on utilities/insurance.
cards.pointValueApprox: ₹1 per Reward Point against select hotel/airline loyalty programs.
cards.rewardTransfer: Yes, to multiple airline and hotel partners at a 1:1 ratio.
cards.milestoneBenefits: Unlimited complimentary domestic and international airport spa access. Unlimited golf lessons/rounds.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: Unlimited for Primary and Add-on cardholders.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: Unlimited for Primary and Add-on cardholders.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Book one, get one on movie/event tickets (up to ₹750, 4 times a month). Dreamfolks membership.

cards.targetAudience: Frequent travelers and lifestyle spenders who value airport access and entertainment benefits.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: Welcome vouchers for travel and shopping worth over ₹9,000.
cards.rewardRateBase: 2 points per ₹100 on domestic. 4 points per ₹100 on international spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: ₹0.25 for statement credit.
cards.rewardTransfer: Yes, but ratios are generally not great.
cards.milestoneBenefits: 4,000 points on spending ₹4 Lakhs. Additional 2,000 points on each ₹1 Lakh spend thereafter.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 2 complimentary visits per quarter. 2 complimentary spa sessions per year at select airports.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 2 complimentary visits per year via Dreamfolks Pass for cardholder + 2 guest visits.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Buy one, get one on BookMyShow (up to ₹500, twice a month). Complimentary golf rounds.

cards.cardName: Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card
cards.targetAudience: Amazon shoppers and users looking for a simple, no-fuss, lifetime-free cashback card.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: None (card is free). Occasional Amazon-specific joining offers.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5% cashback for Prime members on Amazon.in. 3% for non-Prime. 2% on 100+ partner merchants. 1% on all other spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: Not applicable (cashback credited as Amazon Pay balance).
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: None.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Mainly focused on cashback via Amazon Pay.

cards.targetAudience: Mid-level professionals seeking a balance of lifestyle benefits like movies and shopping with some travel perks.
cards.rewardRateBase: 2 Reward Points per ₹100 on domestic. 4 points per ₹100 on international spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: ₹0.25 for statement credit.
cards.rewardTransfer: Yes, but ratios are not favorable.
cards.milestoneBenefits: 3,000 points on spending ₹3 Lakhs. Additional 1,500 points on each ₹1 Lakh spend thereafter.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 2 complimentary visits per quarter.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 2 complimentary visits per year.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Buy one, get one on BookMyShow (up to ₹250, twice a month). 2 complimentary golf rounds per month on spending ₹50,000 in previous month.

cards.cardName: MakeMyTrip ICICI Bank Signature Credit Card
cards.targetAudience: Loyal MakeMyTrip users who want to maximize rewards within the MMT ecosystem.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: ₹1500 My Cash + MMTBLACK Exclusive membership + a luxury hotel voucher.
cards.rewardRateBase: ₹4 My Cash per ₹200 on MMT hotel/holiday bookings. ₹2 on flights. ₹1.25 on other international spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 My Cash = ₹1 for bookings on MakeMyTrip (with usage restrictions).
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 2 complimentary visits per quarter + 1 complimentary railway lounge visit per quarter.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 1 complimentary visit per year with Dreamfolks pass.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: MMTBLACK Exclusive membership perks, concierge service.

cards.targetAudience: Very high spenders and frequent travelers who value airport services and lifestyle perks over reward points post-devaluation.
cards.rewardRateBase: 12 EDGE Rewards per ₹200. 60 EDGE Rewards per ₹200 on Travel EDGE portal.
cards.pointValueApprox: ₹0.20 for statement credit. Up to ₹0.80 via airline/hotel transfer.
cards.rewardTransfer: Good 5:4 transfer ratio to many partners (Vistara, Marriott, United). Some at 5:2.
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: Unlimited for primary cardholder.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: Unlimited Priority Pass access for primary holder + 8 complimentary guest visits per year.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: 8 complimentary airport 'Meet & Greet' services per year. Buy one, get one on BookMyShow (up to ₹500, twice a month).

cards.targetAudience: Serious travelers focused on earning and redeeming airline miles and achieving airline/hotel tier status.
cards.rewardRateBase: 2 EDGE Miles per ₹100. 5 EDGE Miles per ₹100 on Travel EDGE portal or direct airline/hotel spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: 1 EDGE Mile = ₹1 (effectively, as 1 Mile = 2 Partner Points).
cards.rewardTransfer: Excellent. 1 EDGE Mile = 2 Partner Points/Miles (e.g., Vistara, Marriott, United).
cards.milestoneBenefits: Tier-based system. Earn bonus miles at ₹3L (Silver), ₹7.5L (Gold), and ₹15L (Platinum) spend milestones. Higher tiers offer hotel/airline vouchers and airport transfer services.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: Up to 18 visits per year (linked to tier status).
cards.loungeAccessInternational: Up to 12 visits per year (linked to tier status).
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Airport concierge services at higher tiers.

cards.targetAudience: Vistara loyalists who want to fast-track their elite status and earn complimentary business class tickets.
cards.welcomeRenewalBenefit: 1 complimentary Business Class ticket voucher. Complimentary Club Vistara Gold membership.
cards.rewardRateBase: 6 Club Vistara (CV) Points per ₹200 spent.
cards.pointValueApprox: Value varies based on flight redemption (approx. ₹0.80 - ₹1.00 per CV point).
cards.milestoneBenefits: 1 Business Class ticket on spending ₹2.5 Lakhs, ₹5 Lakhs, ₹7.5 Lakhs, and ₹12 Lakhs annually (total 4 tickets).
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 2 complimentary visits per quarter.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: 6 complimentary golf rounds. Concierge services.

cards.targetAudience: Users looking for simple, high cashback on utility bill payments and everyday spends.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5% cashback on bill payments and recharges via Google Pay. 4% cashback on Swiggy, Zomato, Ola. 2% on all other spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: Not applicable (direct statement credit).
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 4 complimentary visits per year.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Dining discounts via Dining Delights program.

cards.targetAudience: Frequent shoppers on Flipkart, Myntra, and other partner merchants.
cards.rewardRateBase: 5% unlimited cashback on Flipkart & Myntra. 4% on preferred partners (Swiggy, Uber, PVR, etc.). 1.5% on all other spends.
cards.pointValueApprox: Not applicable (direct statement credit).
cards.milestoneBenefits: None.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 4 complimentary visits per year.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: None.
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Dining discounts via Dining Delights program. Fuel surcharge waiver.

cards.targetAudience: Urban users focused on lifestyle spends like food delivery, groceries, and online shopping.
cards.rewardRateBase: 10 EDGE points per ₹200. 2X points on retail shopping.
cards.pointValueApprox: ₹0.20 for statement credit.
cards.milestoneBenefits: ₹500 off on BigBasket twice a month on min. ₹3000 order. Swiggy discount of 40% up to ₹200 twice a month. 12 complimentary golf lessons a year.
cards.loungeAccessDomestic: 2 complimentary visits per quarter on spending ₹50,000 in previous 3 months.
cards.loungeAccessInternational: 6 complimentary visits per year via Priority Pass (with Priority Pass membership renewal linked to spends).
cards.lifestyleBenefits: Buy one, get one on BookMyShow (up to ₹300).
